commenter_a: Diane Abbot is a hypocrite of the first order, always trying to play the race card if the argument does not go her way. He's lost big backers, even the labour red tops are Luke warm at best. And grass roots support doesn't transfer to the ordinary man and woman on the street who see him as a reactionary 70s throwback and apologist. Labour will either ditch it before the next general election or face annihilation and ditch him and her after.
